original_text:
For I will be like a lion to Ephraim,
    and like a young lion to the house of Judah.
I, even I, will tear and go away;
    I will carry off, and no one shall rescue.
korean_text: 내가 에브라임에게는 사자 같고 유다 족속에게는 젊은 사자 같으니 바로 내가 움켜갈지라 내가 탈취하여 갈지라도 건져낼 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: For I will be like a lion to Ephraim
and like a young lion to the house of Judah.
I, even I, will tear and go away
sentences.korean_translation: 내가, 곧 내가, 찢고 물러갈 것이니
